title: Analyze Ridership Data
description: A transit analyst wants to analyze ridership data to identify the busiest routes and stops, to inform future service planning.

tasks.description: Generate a report of all tap-on/tap-off data from the fare card system for the last month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully exports the raw ridership data.

tasks.description: Aggregate the data to determine the total number of boardings per route.
tasks.expected_outcome: The data is processed to show total ridership for each route.

tasks.description: Identify the top 5 busiest routes and the top 10 busiest individual bus stops.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis correctly identifies the most heavily used parts of the network.

tasks.description: Create a visualization (e.g., a heatmap) of the busiest stops and include it in a planning report.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, data-driven report is created to aid in decision-making.
